mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOK(BOOKNUM, PRODUCTNUM, ID, CONTENTS, HEADCOUNT, PURPOSE, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, BOOKDATE, BOOKCHECK) VALUES (BOOK_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{productNum},#{id},#{contents},#{headCount},#{purpose},#{startTime},#{endTime},#{bookDate}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, B.* FROM(SELECT * FROM BOOK WHERE BOOKNUM>0 AND BOOKNUM LIKE '%' || #{pager.search} || '%' AND ID=#{member.id} ORDER BY BOOKNUM DESC) B) WHERE R BETWEEN #{pager.startRow} AND #{pager.lastRow}
